extendedInfo.description: Race in 2 different game modes, or practice your driving skill on any of the terrains. Use your Nitro to be faster than the competitors!You need a powerfull device with at least 2.2 OS, and a fast (1GHz or faster) CPU to play it without limitations. It is strongly recommended to update your Android OS in case you are experiencing performance problem on your device! (eg.: 4.0.3 need to be upgraded to 4.0.4)The following devices are recommended to play: Samsung Galaxy S2, Sony Xperia Play, Sony Xperia Arc, HTC SensationHTC Incredible 2Samsung Galaxy S Player (wifi 5.0)Samsung Galaxy AceSamsung AdmireSamsung Exhibit 2 4GMotorola Droid RAZRXPERIA PLAY USERS: CHANGE YOUR CONTROL TO THE TOPMOST ICON (AUTOGAS+ARROWS) IN THE OPTIONS/CONTROL MENU. IT'S ALLOW THE USE OF THE HARDWARE BUTTON PLAY ON YOUR DEVICE !!Other FAST devices are also supported, but you need at least a 800*480 or better screen resolution to play. Do not forget: it's a high quality game for 3D gaming ready devices !If you have a lower screen resolution phone, or a weaker CPU, you can also take a try, but we can't give you a guarantee about playability on these low end devices. You may set Low or High Quality terrain in the options/graphics menu.The game modes are : GATE HUNTER:---------------------There are 8 gates on the terrains. Try to be the first to reach them in order.No two same game, just becouse the gates are random orderedon every game start.The first 3 placements are valuableto get points and coins at the end of the race.Don't forget to upgrade your car with a nitro ready engine to be faster !LAST MAN STANDING:---------------------The last racer who reach the gate in order, will be elimininated.There are not two same game, just becouse the gates are also ordered randomly on every game start.Can you be the last man standing ? A car with a nitro ready engine is always morefaster than others !PRACTICE---------------------No other cars, no race, just you!Learn the gates and enjoy the the drive over the available terrains as long as you want, without any limitations.You have unlimited nitro in this game modeto practice the use of it.- 7 High quality terrains - like no others on Android- Offroad racing with 6 different offroad cars- 4 different custom paints with every car- 3 game modes- Outstanding music and high quality sound effects- Advanced particle effects- Custom graphics options as HQ terrains, or realtime shadows- Buy new cars, paints, terrains, or nitro for virtual currencyPlease give us 5 stars in the market if you play and like the game!Do you have comments or questions ?  Drop us a mail : info@catmoonproductions.com

reviews.title: Xperia play
reviews.comment: Its pretty poor tbh.. Played it for about 5 mins and culdnt take anymore. Buggies too slow, even with nos on, the handling is awful, the graffix r poor, there r far better racing games that take less memory and work far,far better.
reviews.author: Jack Gardner

reviews.title: Needs update
reviews.comment: I love this game, but when I try to race, it freezes. I am not going to uninstall because once fixed, it will still be a great game. I just know it will.

reviews.title: In App purchase was not credited
reviews.comment: To get rid of the ads and enjoy some options, i purchased Dust Coins but never received the credit to my game account. Contacting  via email Catmoon Production for Support did not help either. I received NO reply ... really a bad performance and bad service.
